description:
This game is a turn-based rogue-like RPG. Take turns with your opponent moving across a grid-based map. Move, attack, use itemsâ€¦ Make the best choices to venture through the dungeons!

Enjoy Powered-Up Play in Monster Girls and the Mysterious Adventure 2:
The friend system allows you to have more fun as you become friends with unique monsters, collecting various items along the way! A storyline and tutorial are included to help those new to this world! Time to set off on a mystical adventure!

Strategic Friend System:
- Take more friends with you on your adventures! Three instead of just two!
- Set up to six friends in your reserve!
- Switch between friends during adventures! Make your way through the game with your own unique team!
- Featuring handover skills and equipment to fully strengthen your friends!

Design Equipment That Suits You:
Prefer playing with equipment? Power up yours and create your own strategy!
- Customize equipment with special effect marks!
- Significantly more ""titled"" equipment with unique effects!
- Create the best equipment for you by combining marks and titles!

Wide Range of Housing Features:
Tired of adventures? Want to enjoy a more relaxed pace?
- Arrange furniture and other objects inside and outside your house!
- Build stores and restaurants to support yourself! Design the layout of your village however you like!

STORY:
This is the story from a land far, far away. Having completed his trials to become the Demon Lord, Melt sets off on a homecoming journey with you alongside. Your long travels draw to a close, and this tale begins as you arrive in the village that dreams of peace.
name: Monster Girls and the Mysterious Adventure 2
